courses.title: Stellar Beginnings: Introduction to Astronomy
courses.description: Discover how the universe began, the basic principles of astronomy, and our place among the stars.

courses.title: The Solar System Unlocked: Planets, Moons & More
courses.description: Explore the wonders of our solar system, from the rocky inner planets to icy outer giants and their mysterious moons.

courses.title: Navigating the Night Sky: Stargazing & Constellations
courses.description: Learn how to identify stars, planets, and constellations and get started with backyard stargazing.

courses.title: Cosmic Mysteries: Black Holes, Dark Matter & Beyond
courses.description: Dive into the most fascinating phenomena in the cosmos — black holes, dark matter, and the unknown forces shaping our universe.

courses.title: AstroTech 101: Telescopes, Tools & Observing Techniques
courses.description: Master the tools of an amateur astronomer — how to choose, set up, and use telescopes and apps for celestial observations.
